verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David.) The fool<WH5036> has said<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> "There<WH369> is no<WH369> God.<WH430>" They are corrupt,<WH7843> they have committed<WH8581> abominable<WH8581> deeds;<WH5949> There<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> who does<WH6213> good.<WH9185>

The Lord<WH3068> has looked<WH8259> down<WH8259> from heaven<WH8064> upon the sons<WH1121> of men,<WH120> To see<WH7200> if there<WH3426> are any<WH3426> who understand,<WH7919> Who seek<WH1875> after God.<WH430>

They have all<WH3605> turned<WH5493> aside;<WH5493> together<WH9191> they have become<WH444> corrupt;<WH444> There<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> who does<WH6213> good,<WH9185> not even<WH1571> one.<WH259>
Do all<WH3605> the workers<WH6466> of wickedness<WH205> not know,<WH3045> Who eat<WH398> up my people<WH5971> [as] they eat<WH398> bread,<WH3899> [And] do not call<WH7121> upon the Lord<WH3068>?
There<WH8033> they are in great<WH6343> dread,<WH6342> For God<WH430> is with the righteous<WH6662> generation.<WH1755>
You would put<WH954> to shame<WH954> the counsel<WH6098> of the afflicted,<WH6041> But the Lord<WH3068> is his refuge.<WH4268>

Oh,<WH4310> <WH5414> that the salvation<WH3444> of Israel<WH3478> would come out of Zion!<WH6726> When the Lord<WH3068> restores<WH7725> His captive<WH7622> people,<WH5971> Jacob<WH3290> will rejoice,<WH1523> Israel<WH3478> will be glad.<WH8055>
